availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Catherine Russell. Father of Abraham Russell, Joseph Russell, and James Jefferson Russell. Served in Captain Robert Paxton's Company of the Kentucky Militia from 1814 to 1815. Farmer in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 87B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 591.
War of 1812 Pension and Bounty Land Warrant Application Files, NARA RG15, Roll RG15-1812PB-Bx3001.
